A graphic novel adaptation of "The Little Girl Who Could See Sounds" featuring a diverse cast of characters and unique visuals to bring the story to life.
An interactive app that allows users to experience the sounds that the little girl hears and explore the world of sound through her eyes.
A musical play adaptation of the story that incorporates original music and dance to bring the story to life on stage.
A virtual reality experience that immerses users in the world of the little girl and allows them to explore the sounds that she sees.
A podcast series that delves deeper into the story and explores the themes of imagination, creativity, and the power of the human mind.
